2154.subject: MLML
2154.descrlong:
MLML 212: Adv Top Mar Vert-  Advanced consideration of the ecology, physiology, and phylogeny of fishes, birds, reptiles, or mammals, emphasizing current literature and research. Topics and emphasis vary with term and instructor. May be repeated once for credit. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact SEP program office for MLML registration procedures. (Likely to be offered every other fall semester.)

(Prereq: Exclude Freshmen and Sophomore and Junior)
